coded_answer.p: Having seen your musical show last Sunday, I am writing to complain about the problems and to ask for some money back.
Firstly, concerning the actors, in your advertisement you stated that DANNY BROOK AND TINA TRUELOVE would perform in the musical, but in fact different actors performed. I was so disappointed!!

Regarding starting time and the theatre restaurant, to see the musical I had to wait about 45 minuitsminutes because it started at 20:15. As well as this, after seeing the musical I went to the theatre restaurant, which you referred to in your advertisement, but it was closed already. I was really angry!
Lastly, with reference to ticket prices, your theatre hadn't any discounts even for children. I had to buy an adult ticket for my child and spent more money than I had expected.
I am sure you can imagine what I felt. It was not a perfect evening for me and my child at all! I am also sure you can refund my money.
I look forward to hearing from you.
How are you getting on? I'm fine. Having talked with you a couple of weeks ago, I'd like to give you some information.

I know you are always interested in detictivedetective stories, especially Agatha Christie's. Don't be surprised! Her best detective stories are going to be read on the radio this Sunday evening at 18:00. I'm sure you'll be pleased. You are supposed to listen to them.

As well as this, the stories are going to be read in English. It's a good chance for you to improve your English. You can notcannot only listen to her best detective stories, but also learn English automatically. It will be fantastic!

Where the stories are concerned, they will not be difficult to understand because you already know the stories and the naraitorsnarators are going to read clearly. What I'd like to say is you should listen to them.
I hope you're happy to receive my letter and am looking forward to hearing from you.
